item.title: Falter Network Hardening: UCI-to-Bird2 Translator
item.description:
aditya@chooramani:~$ cat freifunk_contribution.log

üåê Project Overview

Contributed a core networking utility to the Falter Project (the firmware for Freifunk Berlin’s mesh network). The PR introduces falter-bird-utils, a dedicated translator that moves BGP backbone logic away from static files and into a dynamic, firmware-integrated system.

Pull Request: freifunk-berlin/falter-packages #502

üõ†Ô∏è Technical Implementation

I developed a robust bridge between UCI (Unified Configuration Interface) and the Bird 2.x routing daemon, ensuring that mesh nodes can be configured through standard OpenWrt tools.
